pageContent:
Profile

Experienced in both manual testing and automation testing of web applications
using Selenium, TestNG, Cucumber, and Rest API testing using Postman and
RestAssured.

Holds a Masters Certification in Big Data Technologies from TrendyTech and has a
background in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.

With over 4 years of experience in analyzing, designing, developing, and deploying
intranet and internet-based applications, I have participated in both development
and support & maintenance projects. I have experience working in the Onsite-
Offshore model type of project.

I am a highly motivated team player with exceptional written, communication,
analytical, interpersonal, and client-facing skills. I am flexible, adaptable, open-
minded, and able to work independently. I am a self-starter with a quick learning
ability.
Experience
SDET, Numpy NinjaNov 2022 – present
Developed comprehensive test cases based on business requirements, functional

ability.
Experience
SDET, Numpy NinjaNov 2022 – present
Developed comprehensive test cases based on business requirements, functional
requirements, and design documentation.
Implemented web automation using Java, Eclipse, TestNG, Cucumber, Maven,
data-driven approach, and Selenium WebDriver with a Page Object Model and
Page Factory design pattern.
Adopted BDD (Behavior Driven Development) using Cucumber features,
scenarios, and step definitions in Gherkin language and generated cucumber and
Extent Reports.
Optimized testing time by 75% through parallel execution of tests and
performed cross-browser testing on Chrome, Firefox, and Chrome. Utilized Allure
Reports to effectively analyze automated test cases.
Conducted contract testing for APIs using POSTMAN and RestAssured, Cucumber,
and validated JSON schema and response body.
Efficiently identified, logged, and monitored bugs, and provided developers with
necessary information for resolution.

Experienced in project management tools such as Jira and Trello board.
